title: The Spiritual Golfer
description: Abiding deep within every golfer's spirit is a unique swing. Whether a beginner or advanced player, all golfers can dramatically improve their shot-making skills by taking an exciting and revealing journey inside "The Spiritual Golfer." This intriguing page turner unravels the mystery and confusion surrounding playing great golf! From the boom of blasting the ball off the first tee, to the comforting sound of the ball dropping into the cup on the last hole, this book reads more like a novel than a cut-and-dried instruction book. It is filled with real life stories, humor and pictures, all wrapped up into an adventure you'll truly enjoy!
author: Robert Lumpkin
